title: Soreyuke! Uchuu Senkan Yamamoto Yohko (Dub)
alternative_title: Starship Girl Yamamoto Yohko, それゆけ！宇宙戦艦ヤマモト・ヨーコ
description: Meet Yohko Yamamoto - a cat-eyed, 15-year-old girl in the late 20th century with a love for videogames and Pocky. Because of her exceptional talent with arcade shooters, she's been recruited by Lawson to travel a thousand years into the future to pilot the prototype ship TA-29. Together with Ayano Elizabeth Hakuhoin, Madoka Midoh and Momiji Kagariya, Yohko leads the Terran team against Rouge and Ness' infamous Red Snappers in this epic space adventure.
